scripts.lint-check: cd src; yarn lint-check; cd ..; cd IMA; yarn lint-check; cd ..
scripts.lint-fix: cd src; yarn lint-fix; cd ..; cd IMA; yarn lint-fix; cd ..
scripts.postinstall: cd src; yarn install; cd ..; cd IMA; yarn install; cd ..
scripts.check-outdated: yarn outdated; cd src; yarn outdated; cd ..; cd IMA; yarn outdated; cd ..
scripts.upgrade-to-latest: yarn upgrade --latest; cd src; yarn upgrade --latest; cd ..; cd IMA; yarn upgrade --latest; cd ..
